greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest prime factor of 3-smooth numbers.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Reap[Do[p = FactorInteger[n][[-1, 1]]; If[p < 5, Sow[p]], {n, 1, 2*10^5}] ][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 17 2017 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 18 2003
